  • Method Details

    • getCurrentProgram

      public String getCurrentProgram(String trafficLightGroupId) throws InternalFederateException
      Getter for the current traffic light program running on a certain traffic light group with the given id.
      Parameters:
      trafficLightGroupId - The group Id of a traffic light.
      Returns:
      Current program of a certain traffic light group.
      Throws:
      InternalFederateException - if some serious error occurs during writing or reading. The TraCI connection is shut down.

    • getCurrentPhase

      public int getCurrentPhase(String trafficLightGroupId) throws InternalFederateException
      Getter for the current phase of a traffic light program that is currently running on the traffic light group with the given id.
      Parameters:
      trafficLightGroupId - Traffic light group id.
      Returns:
      Current phase of a traffic light program of a certain traffic light group.
      Throws:
      InternalFederateException - if some serious error occurs during writing or reading. The TraCI connection is shut down.

    • getNextSwitchTime

      public double getNextSwitchTime(String trafficLightGroupId) throws InternalFederateException
      Getter for the assumed time of the next switch from the current phase to the next one of the current traffic light program of a certain traffic light group.
      Parameters:
      trafficLightGroupId - Traffic light group id.
      Returns:
      Assumed time of next phase switch in seconds.
      Throws:
      InternalFederateException - if some serious error occurs during writing or reading. The TraCI connection is shut down.

      Throws:
